New Records: Emmanuel Clase earned his 41st save of the season with a 1-2-3 ninth inning and has converted his last 28 consecutive save opportunities.
Josh Naylor reached 100 RBI for the first time in his career.
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit his first home run in a Cleveland uniform, a two-run blast off Michael Wacha in the fifth inning.
Josh Naylor hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning.
Gavin Williams turned in seven strong innings for his third win, striking out seven and walking one.
Jhonkensy Noel made a diving catch on a sinking line drive by Maikel Garcia, preventing a potential Royals rally.
Post-Match Reflections: Lane Thomas expressed his desire to contribute to Cleveland's success.
Gavin Williams discussed his adjustments and plan during the game.
Jhonkensy Noel expressed happiness in contributing to the team's success in a pennant race.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland moved 4 1/2 games ahead of the Royals in the AL Central standings.
Cleveland's magic number to clinch the division is at 22 with 24 games left.
The magic number to clinch a playoff spot is 16 over Boston.
